page.title: 16FASHION FOR MEN
page.content: MEN Men wear creased shirts and drain pipe trousers.Creased shirts are permanantly creased and they don't need ironing.Drain pipe trousers are very tight trousers.For shoes they wear ankle strap boots and there hair is sometimes spiked and sprayed.ankle strap boots are leather with buckled straps on.They wear studed leather jackets and dog collers.They also have skin heads (not much hair on.)Men also wear one earing,a loop one.They can also have earings allover their ears.Boys and girls fashion is more or less the same.
